refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: These parameter entities control the inclusion of DocBook modules.

refentry.refsect1:
Description
The modules listed here are included in DocBook DTD via parameter entity reference. For more information about these modules, and additional modules that can be defined, see .
The following sections identify all of the module parameter entities in DocBook.
&parament.db.gen;
